original_text: But perhaps the husband has spoken the truth. Perhaps his new wife cannot show that she had not had sex before.
korean_text: 그 일이 참되어 그 처녀에게 처녀의 표적이 없거든

sentences.original_text: But perhaps the husband has spoken the truth.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아마도 남편이 진실을 말했을지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: Perhaps his new wife cannot show
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그의 새 아내는 증명할 수 없을지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: that she had not had sex before
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 이전에 성관계를 가지지 않았다는 것을
